page.title: 12ALDINGHAM SCHOOL PUPIL.
page.content: My name is Richard Wilson, I am nine years old. I live at Bay View, New- biggin. I wake up at 8.o'clock each morning and have my breakfast in bed I have Weetabix, fruit juice and hot- chocolate. Next I go to the bathroom, clean my teeth and wash my hands and face. After that I go to the bottom of the garden and collect the two pint bottles of milk for my mum, which the milkman has left. I take them into the house, put them into the fridge, collect my school bag and walk to the main road in front of my house to catch the mini-bus to school. It leaves at 8.45am. I come home at 4.00 p.m. then play out on my bike before my tea. My favourite meals are, cheese sauce and cauliflower,nut and cheese burgers, soft boiled eggs or cheese and egg buns. I have my mid-day meal at school. It is a hot cooked meal.
